issue.title: Splash screen doesn't close on Windows

content.raw:
problem came back. My current understanding is that initialization is considered complete in Scene.cc:1779, but no Scene messages are being received.
It seems only MainWindow and ModelListWidget publish to ~/scene.
They publish on ShowOrigin(), ShowGrid(), and PropertiesChanged(), none of which seem right...
Still no idea what's going on here. More digging to do, any help would be greatly appreciated.
